trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat this turn, all Revelers gain haste until end of turn and attack this combat if able.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of combat this turn, all Revelers gain haste until end of turn and attack this combat if able.

trans-unit.source: Each player may sacrifice an artifact or enchantment. Impulsive Destruction deals 3 damage to each player who didn't sacrifice a permanent this way.
trans-unit.target: Each player may sacrifice an artifact or enchantment. Impulsive Destruction deals 3 damage to each player who didn't sacrifice a permanent this way.

trans-unit.source: Return two cards named Ecstatic Piper from Xenagos's graveyard to the battlefield. At the beginning of combat this turn, Impulsive Return deals damage to each player equal to the number of Revelers on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: Return two cards named Ecstatic Piper from Xenagos's graveyard to the battlefield. At the beginning of combat this turn, Impulsive Return deals damage to each player equal to the number of Revelers on the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: TDAG·11 | Rip to Pieces | Card Name
TDAG·11 | Rip to Pieces | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat this turn, each Reveler deals 1 damage to each player and each creature those players control.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of combat this turn, each Reveler deals 1 damage to each player and each creature those players control.

trans-unit.source: Xenagos Ascended gains trample until end of turn and attacks this turn if able.
trans-unit.target: Xenagos Ascended gains trample until end of turn and attacks this turn if able.

trans-unit.source: Xenagos's Strike deals 4 damage to each player.
trans-unit.target: Xenagos's Strike deals 4 damage to each player.

trans-unit.resname: TDAG·14 | Dance of Flame | Card Name
TDAG·14 | Dance of Flame | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Reveler attacks, Dance of Flame deals 1 damage to each player.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a Reveler attacks, Dance of Flame deals 1 damage to each player.

trans-unit.resname: TDAG·15 | Dance of Panic | Card Name
TDAG·15 | Dance of Panic | Card Text
trans-unit.source: As long as five or more Revelers are on the battlefield, all Revelers have haste and attack each turn if able.
trans-unit.target: As long as five or more Revelers are on the battlefield, all Revelers have haste and attack each turn if able.
